attributes.action: Remove George Osborne as Chancellor, following his massive anti Brexit stance.
attributes.background: Osborne & Cameron had no faith in Brexit we cannot allow them to run the country now that we must run the finances and make Brexit work. the people have voted to leave the EU, we want to be represented by  politicians who are committed to the cause.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked or fired.
